Fixed a conflict with #SmartVolumeControl2. For the latest changes always be sure to check: . 1. Added the ability to request for a gift, within the tweak's settings panel.
2. Added the ability to transfer you license from your old device to your new one or using your new device restoring the license from your old device.
3. Added full iOS12.x compatibility.
4. Added a second presentation style.
6. Added Mixer option (light, dark, darker, black).
7. Rewrote from scratch.
8. Highly improved the code logic. Drastically reduced the required code to make it work.
9. Highly reduced memory being used.
10. Added orientation support.
11. Added 3 new volume categories for total of twelve (12).
12. Improved support for #SmartVolumeControl2.
13. Added support for #Aerify, #Melior and #Ultrasound.
14. Fixed all reported bugs.

To learn more, please visit: Midkin.net

v1.2:

- Fixed several reported issues.
- Added new options at settings pane.
- Improved code.
